metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28636 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting in version 0.60 and prior to versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7, a vulnerability allows an administrator to create a malicious external link. This issue is fixed in versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
